name: Christmas Game Santa Jump
description:
Christmas Games Santa Jump is Noel game 2016 for you and your family.
With Christmas Games Santa Jump you will enjoy the Christmas atmosphere with Christmas song in Christmas day
- Christmas day is coming .Wellcome to Christmas Game with title gane Santa Jump
- Christmas game for kid and your family
- Mr. Santa jump really fun and interesting
- Christmas music in Christmas Game Santa Jump for kids in Christmas day
- Christmas 2016 coming near . You will really want to play Christmas Games Santa Jump
- Christmas Games Santa Jump is game for Christmas season near
- Merry christmas to you and your family
How to play :
- Tap the screen to jump and avoid
- Jump to the rope and jump back and avoid the approaching the fire
- You will have to pass the fire to reach the highscore
Thank for playing Christmas Game Santa Jump!
